alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:34PM CDT until July 01 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON AND SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 334 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Villa Ridge to near Dittmer to 6 miles east of Richwoods, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Union, Pacific, St. Clair, Villa Ridge, Cedar Hill, Cedar Hill Lakes, Dittmer, Scotsdale, Morse Mill, Oermann, Robertsville, Catawissa, Moselle, and Grubville. This also includes Robertsville State Park. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 242 and 247. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
